postData.contentHtml:
Smol

https://tryhackme.com/room/smol | medium | Test your enumeration skills on this boot-to-root machine.

Information：At the heart of Smol is a WordPress website, a common target due to its extensive plugin ecosystem. The machine showcases a publicly known vulnerable plugin, highlighting the risks of neglecting software updates and security patches. Enhancing the learning experience, Smol introduces a backdoored plugin, emphasizing the significance of meticulous code inspection before integrating third-party components.

Quick Tips: Do you know that on computers without GPU like the AttackBox, John The Ripper is faster than Hashcat?

前期踩点

和 HackMyVm 的 Smol 一模一样：https://www.sunsetaction.top/2025/04/03/HackMyVMSmol/
